title: Flash fried steak with mushroom ketchup
description: If you love that retro flavour of mushroom ketchup, guess what? You can make your own. Blended Portobello mushrooms, vinegar and anchovies give it that unique flavour. Unbeatable shaken over steak.
ingredients: 4 Portobello mushroom, pulsed in food processor
2 x 250g/9oz tail fillet steaks, flattened to 1cm/½in thick
